CustomField.description: This is from Referral created date to the case Created Date
CustomField.formula: IF( AND( NOT(ISBLANK(Referral_Created_Date__c)), NOT(ISBLANK( Case__r.Case_Closed_Date__c )) ), Case__r.Case_Closed_Date__c - Referral_Created_Date__c, NULL )
CustomField.label: Days-Referral Created to Case ClosedDate
